Package hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.algorithm.mdd.ansd

Interface StateSpaceInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
MddStateSpaceInfo
public interface StateSpaceInfo
Represents a sub-state space of the system under analysis. Instances of this type have some sort of a decision diagram node underneath to represent the reachable substates.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

    Description
    hu.bme.mit.delta.collections.IntSetView
    getLocalStateSpace()
    Gets the local states of the underlying component that are contained in the current sub-state space.

    boolean
    hasInfiniteStates()
    Returns true if the underlying component is known to have specific reachable states, false if its state space is undefined, that is, it can be in any state.

  • Method Details

    • getTraceInfo

      Object getTraceInfo()
      Gets the trace info associated with the currently processed variable.
      Returns:
      The current trace info.

    • getTraceInfo

      default <T> T getTraceInfo(Class<T> typeToken)

    • hasInfiniteStates

      boolean hasInfiniteStates()
      Returns true if the underlying component is known to have specific reachable states, false if its state space is undefined, that is, it can be in any state.
      Returns:
      True if the underlying component has specific reachable states, false if its state space is undefined.

    • getLocalStateSpace

      hu.bme.mit.delta.collections.IntSetView getLocalStateSpace()
      Gets the local states of the underlying component that are contained in the current sub-state space. Returns null if hasInfiniteStates() returns false.
      Returns:
      The local states of the underlying component that are contained in the current sub-state space or null if the state space is undefined.

    • getLocalStateSpace

      StateSpaceInfo getLocalStateSpace(Object someLowerComponent)
      Gets the local states of someLowerComponent that are contained in the current sub-state space. Returns null if the state space of someLowerComponent is undefined.
      Returns:
      The local states of the underlying component that are contained in the current sub-state space or null if the state space is undefined.

    • toStructuralRepresentation

      hu.bme.mit.delta.java.mdd.MddNode toStructuralRepresentation()
